ch0123_80_mizuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you!
ch0123_80_mizuki/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s do all sorts of things and have fun today!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7101_0701_01_10:
Today, I felt like putting my hair up in
braided tails.
ch0123_80_mizuki/7101_0701_02_10: Hehe! Do they look good on me?
ch0123_80_mizuki/7102_0701_01_10:
Even if Ultra Beasts come from a different world
than other Pokémon, I still think we can all be
friends!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7102_0701_02_10:
Just look at me—right after I left Kanto, I
made some friends right away...
ch0123_80_mizuki/7102_0701_03_10: And I really bonded with everyone in Alola!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7103_0701_01_10:
I once met a couple at Hau’oli City Hall in Alola
who were applying for their marriage license...
ch0123_80_mizuki/7103_0701_02_10:
The father of the bride disapproved of their
marriage because he felt the groom wasn’t strong
enough for his daughter.
ch0123_80_mizuki/7103_0701_03_10:
I guess you could say marriage is a kind of trial,
huh!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7104_0701_01_10: I go all out—even when I’m eating!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7104_0701_02_10: And I also expect the chef to go all out, too!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7104_0701_03_10:
So, in a way...I guess meals are kinda like
Pokémon battles!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7105_0701_01_10:
Let me tell you all about a place in Alola I highly
recommend, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0123_80_mizuki/7105_0701_03_10: It’s an amazing place with tons of Pikachu!
ch0123_80_mizuki/7105_0701_04_10:
You can also take the Pikachu Professor quiz there.
I wonder how many questions you can get right?
ch0123_80_mizuki/1701_0701_02_10: You can have this! I found it a while ago!
ch0123_80_mizuki/1701_0702_01_10:
I was holding on to it because I wanted to give
it to you!
ch0123_80_mizuki/2501_0701_01_10: Lillie and I happen to have matching makeup bags!
ch0123_80_mizuki/2501_0701_02_10:
She got one for being the 99,999th customer at an
apparel shop!
ch0123_80_mizuki/2501_0701_03_10:
I wonder why they didn’t give it to the 100,000th
customer, though?
ch0123_80_mizuki/2501_0702_01_10:
Lillie told me that whenever she sees an apparel
shop, she can’t help but check it out!
ch0123_80_mizuki/2501_0702_02_10:
They’ve got a lot of cute clothes, so it’s fun even
if you’re just browsing.
ch0123_80_mizuki/2511_0701_01_10:
The Alola region’s got a bunch of quirky
restaurants!
ch0123_80_mizuki/2511_0701_02_10:
The eatery in Konikoni City on Akala Island, Sushi
High Roller on Ula’ula Island, the Floating
Restaurant on Poni Island...
ch0123_80_mizuki/2511_0702_01_10: I’ve even eaten there with the Island Kahunas!
ch0123_80_mizuki/2511_0702_02_10:
They’re really generous and even pay for my
meal!
ch0123_80_mizuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Alola! I wonder who or what I’ll run into today?
I can’t wait!
ch0123_80_mizuki/3003_0701_01_10:
There’s so much I wanna do, I’m having trouble
deciding on my after-lunch plans!
ch0123_80_mizuki/3005_0701_01_10:
I wonder how the moon looks tonight...
Why don’t we go see?
